description: Complete PostgreSQL schema for SRA Data Pipeline - Financial data from FMP and Fundata sources

FMP.description: Financial Modeling Prep - US equity and ETF data

Fundata.description: Canadian mutual fund and pricing data

equity_profile.description: Company profile information for 4000+ US equities

vol_avg.description: Average trading volume (stored as text to handle decimals)

mkt_cap.description: Market capitalization (stored as text to handle decimals)

full_time_employees.description: Employee count (stored as text to handle decimals)

equity_income.description: Income statement data for US equities

ebitda.description: Earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation, and amortization

equity_balance.description: Balance sheet data for US equities

equity_cashflow.description: Cash flow statement data for US equities

equity_earnings.description: Earnings data for US equities (actual vs estimated)

equity_peers.description: Peer company relationships for US equities

operatingCashFlowSalesRatio.description: Operating cash flow to sales ratio

freeCashFlowOperatingCashFlowRatio.description: Free cash flow to operating cash flow ratio

priceToFreeCashFlowsRatio.description: Price to free cash flow ratio

priceToOperatingCashFlowsRatio.description: Price to operating cash flow ratio

equity_key_metrics.description: Key financial metrics for US equities

pocfratio.description: Price to operating cash flow ratio

pfcfRatio.description: Price to free cash flow ratio

equity_balance_growth.description: Balance sheet growth metrics for US equities

growthTotalLiabilitiesAndTotalEquity.description: Total liabilities and total equity growth

equity_cashflow_growth.description: Cash flow growth metrics for US equities

equity_financial_growth.description: Financial growth metrics for US equities

tenYOperatingCFGrowthPerShare.description: 10-year operating cash flow growth per share

fiveYOperatingCFGrowthPerShare.description: 5-year operating cash flow growth per share

threeYOperatingCFGrowthPerShare.description: 3-year operating cash flow growth per share

tenYDividendperShareGrowthPerShare.description: 10-year dividend per share growth per share

fiveYDividendperShareGrowthPerShare.description: 5-year dividend per share growth per share

threeYDividendperShareGrowthPerShare.description: 3-year dividend per share growth per share

equity_income_growth.description: Income statement growth metrics for US equities

tenYOperatingCFGrowthPerShare.description: 10-year operating cash flow growth per share

fiveYOperatingCFGrowthPerShare.description: 5-year operating cash flow growth per share

threeYOperatingCFGrowthPerShare.description: 3-year operating cash flow growth per share

tenYDividendperShareGrowthPerShare.description: 10-year dividend per share growth per share

fiveYDividendperShareGrowthPerShare.description: 5-year dividend per share growth per share

threeYDividendperShareGrowthPerShare.description: 3-year dividend per share growth per share

equity_financial_scores.description: Financial scoring metrics (Altman Z-Score, Piotroski Score) for US equities

etfs_profile.description: ETF profile information for 1500+ exchange-traded funds

mktCap.description: Market capitalization (stored as text to handle decimals)

fullTimeEmployees.description: Employee count (stored as text to handle decimals)

isEtf.description: Whether security is an ETF (always true)

isFund.description: Whether security is a fund (always true)

etfs_data.description: Detailed ETF holdings and performance data

equity_quotes.description: Historical daily stock quotes for US equities (1962-2025)

volume.description: Trading volume (stored as text to handle decimals)

unadjustedVolume.description: Unadjusted trading volume (stored as text to handle decimals)

volume.description: Trading volume (stored as text to handle decimals)

unadjustedVolume.description: Unadjusted trading volume (stored as text to handle decimals)

fund_general.description: General information for 2700+ Canadian mutual funds

fund_daily_nav.description: Daily net asset value for Canadian mutual funds

fund_quotes.description: Historical pricing data for Canadian mutual funds (2015-2025)

TEXT_columns.issue: CSV contains decimal strings like '84450.0' that cannot be cast to BIGINT
TEXT_columns.solution: Store as TEXT to preserve data integrity, convert in application layer if needed

preprocessing.purpose: Clean empty values, null strings, and malformed data before PostgreSQL COPY

duplicate_handling.conflict_resolution: SELECT DISTINCT ON (symbol, date) ... ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING

performance_optimizations.copy_method: PostgreSQL COPY FROM for maximum speed
performance_optimizations.transaction_isolation: Individual table rollbacks prevent cascade failures
performance_optimizations.csv_cleaning: Real-time CSV error recovery and line fixing

data_quality.accuracy: Source validated from FMP and Fundata APIs
data_quality.consistency: Structured PostgreSQL schemas with proper constraints

deployment_info.deployment_target: Render.com with separated database and worker services
